ygData.subject: Re: Leatherskin spell
ygData.msgSnippet: I didnt find shieldskin to be of much use. and I mainly only used leatherskin when soloing. But once I got steelskin, I used that spell like crack, I allways
ygData.messageBody:
I didnt find shieldskin to be of much use. and I mainly only used
leatherskin when soloing. But
once I got steelskin, I used that spell like crack, I allways have it on me
and find it to be VERY
usefull.


-----Original Message-----
From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, September 05, 1999 8:23 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Leatherskin spell


>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
>Recently made level 24 and was wondering whether or not to buy leatherskin
>spell. Has anyone else found this spell useful? The bloodstone component is
>over 5 gp each, so it can become expensive to use it often.
>
>Greg (Kronan on Innoruuk)
